EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_EMC Strategic Forum in NYC @ Pivotal_Q115.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: You are registered to join Pivotal after the EMC Strategic Forum in NYC
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
Thank you for registering to join Pivotal after the EMC Strategic Forum at the Chelsea Pivotal office for an Informational Open House and Cocktail Hour.
Please find event details below:
Date: Tuesday, March 10, 2015 Time: 3-6PM EST Location: Pivotal <https://www.google.com/maps/place/Pivotal+Labs/@40.74028,-73.995083,17z/data=!3m1!4b1!4m2!3m1!1s0x89c259bccd2dfbab:0xad7f9c23ffc3e702>, 625 Avenue of the Americas, 2nd Floor, NYC
Agenda: 3:00 - 3:45 Presentations by Bill Cook and Rob Mee 3:45 - 4:00 Time for informal questions and chat 4:00 - 4:30 Pivotal Labs tours 4:30 - 6:00 Drinks and hors-d'oeuvres
{{my.Save the Date:default=edit me}}
We look forward to you to seeing you,
The Pivotal Team
